songs.title: Booze Right
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Bibi Bourelly]
Love me down
Love me down
Love me out
Love me now
Love me now
Love, love me now

[Verse 1: Bibi Bourelly]
Backdoor secrets, I think you should leave her (Oh)
Tryna push me over to the side
You're a liar, you gon' love me overtime
'Cause you are mine 'til...

[Chorus: Bibi Bourelly]
Phone'll ring and it feel like the same old thing over and over again (Hoo, hoo, hoo, hoo, hoo, hoo)
I'm the type a girl to fall in love with the moonlight
I don't really trust too much, that's the booze, right?
Yeah, to me that's the booze, right?
I'm the type a girl to fall in love with the moonlight
I don't really trust too much, that's the booze, right? (Hoo, hoo, hoo, hoo, hoo, hoo)

[Verse 2: Bibi Bourelly]
You don't ever know when you should stop
Neither do I, babe
I don't care if it's bad for me or not, I'm not here to have it
Phone'll ring and it feel like the same old thing over and over again (Hoo, hoo, hoo, hoo, hoo, hoo)

[Chorus: Bibi Bourelly]
Phone'll ring and it feel like the same old thing over and over again (Hoo, hoo, hoo, hoo, hoo, hoo)
I'm the type a girl to fall in love with the moonlight
I don't really trust too much, that's the booze, right?
Yeah, to me that's the booze, right?
I'm the type a girl to fall in love with the moonlight
I don't really trust too much, that's the booze, right? (Hoo, hoo, hoo, hoo, hoo, hoo)

[Outro: Bibi Bourelly]
Love me now
Love me now
